author: sky.cactus
content: <@543900561460822016> As the official spokesperson for go-ethereum, can you let me know what it would take to convince the go-ethereum team to return the transaction hash of a transaction when `eth_sendRawTransaction` is called twice for the same transaction?

content: Right now it returns an error, which is unhelpful and breaks apps when instead it could have just returned the hash and broken nothing.
